articles.description: Epic is offering 20% back in store credit on all Fortnite, Rocket League, and Fall Guys Purchases through EGS--permanently.
articles.content: With Fortnite and other Epic mobile titles finally returning to iOS soon after five years, Epic Games is marking the occasion by introducing a major bonus for those who spend money on its games: 20% … [+2272 chars]

articles.title: Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 are at Their Lowest Price Ever Right Now - NBC News
articles.description: Today's Deal of the Day is the Beats Powerbeats Pro 2. This is the first time the newly launched earbuds are on sale — grab them for 20% off.
articles.content: The original Beats Powerbeats Pro launched in 2019. Despite their age, I see them frequently in the ears of New York City commuters. Its successor, the Beats Powerbeats Pro 2, launched earlier this y… [+1680 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo president comments on approach to Switch 2 game and hardware prices - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Nintendo president has been asked to discuss how the company is handling Switch 2 game and hardware prices.
articles.content: Around the reveal of Nintendo Switch 2, there was a ton of discussion taking place around pricing. While the system having a set cost of $450 was a tough pill to swallow for some, for the most part, … [+1443 chars]
